mashiro.gawk: She was personally crafted to me by an old, eastern smith.
mashiro.try: I'd rather not dull the blade on the $name$.

kojin.gawk: One blade. More than enough to kill anything that moves.
kojin.try: I don't want to cut the $name$.

matches.handle: I don't need light right now.
matches.try: I don't want to set the $name$ on fire.

lockpicks.gawk: I'm no master of unlocking, but I should be able to open anything simple with it.
lockpicks.try: I don't need to pick the $name$.

phone.gawk: It's my phone. It makes phone calls.

tree.try mashiro: I could easily cut it down, but I don't see the point.
tree.try kojin: Kojin is too brittle to cut down such a thick tree.

shadow.handle: I'll kick his ass out of my garden.

options.question: What are you doing in my garden at this hour?
options.inform: Some of us are trying to sleep here.
options.dismiss: This is private property. Buzz off.

script.intro: Who's knocking at my door in the middle of the night?

light switch.gawk: I should turn the lights on.
light switch.blab: I don't think it could tell me anything enlightening.

gawk list: When I die, I want this thing as my coffin lid.
television.blab: Christie Bell won't answer my back.

phone.gawk: My smartphone. I feel naked without it.

stereo speakers.gawk: They will melt your face off anyday.
stereo speakers.handle: I don't wanna wake up the neighbours.
stereo speakers.blab: Sound goes out of them, not in.

video games.gawk: Only the finest of adventure games.

bow.gawk: I can hit a target at 500 meters with this puppy.
handle list: No, you won't find any arrows in this adventure either.
Please stop trying to take the bow.

heavy machine gun.handle: Even if I felt like dragging that hefty hunk of metal with me, it's just a replica.

swords.gawk: Mashiro and Kojin, my most treasured possessions.

lockpicks.gawk: I'm no master of unlocking, but I can crack up a simple lock.

outside door.gawk: I can't see a thing out there, but somebody's knocking at the door.
outside door.gawk no shadow: Whoever was out there, they're gone now.
outside door.handle: I'm not opening that door until I can see who's knocking.
outside door.handle have flashlight: I'm not going out there unarmed.
outside door.handle exit: Let's give our nightly visitor a warm welcome.

shadow.gawk: There's someone out there, knocking at the door.
shadow.try mashiro: It's completely dark outside, I need my flashlight.
shadow.try matches: These matches don't give enough light.

retarded hat.gawk: It was my grandfather's. Bless him.
retarded hat.handle: I don't want it. It's retarded.

darkness.gawk: I can't see my own asshole in front of me.

safe.gawk: I threw away the key years ago, to stay sharp.
safe.need hands: I need both my hands free.

bed.handle: This is no time to sleep.
